title: Pet food revolution: Fresh ingredients and human grade standards on the rise
slug: fox32-pet-food-revolution
category: news
tags: food, dogs, cats, nutrition
date: 2024-04-17

![News]({static}/images/news.gif){: height=100 style="float:left; padding:16px"}

Discover how dedicated pet parents are redefining mealtime despite rising food costs in FOX 32’s Special Report. Scott Schneider explores Chicago’s first Just Food for Dogs store in Lincoln Park, revealing how fresh, human-grade ingredients are setting new standards in pet nutrition. From the allure of ancestral diets to the challenges of cost and preparation, learn how some are finding healthier, happier paths for their pets. Dive into the full story to see why quality might just be worth the extra penny for our furry family members. [Read more on FOX32](https://www.fox32chicago.com/news/pet-food-revolution-fresh-ingredients-human-grade-standards-on-the-rise)
